summary: Sherlock Holmes sets out to discover why a trio of murderous villains, including a dangerously attractive female, are desperate to obtain three unassuming and inexpensive little music boxes.

keywords: counterfeiting|sherlock holmes character|dr. john watson character|three word title|psychotronic film
title: Vestida para matar
